mainFeatures.title: Infinite Download
mainFeatures.description: Once you subscribe to our plans, they're all yours. Download as many as you want and use them for work presentations, wallpapers, and much more.

mainFeatures.title: Purely Handcrafted
mainFeatures.description: No AI, no generic images. Crafted from various chemicals, fabric, clouds, or even particles as small as dust.

mainFeatures.title: All Are Under Licensed
mainFeatures.description: The Only limitation with these abstract images is that you are not able to sell them in any form, whether digital or hard copy (such as paintings or prints on paper).

mainFeatures.title: Cancel Anytime
mainFeatures.description: Subscribe at your own pace, and cancel when you feel it's enough.

mainFeatures.title: Empowering For Team
mainFeatures.description: We support multiple seats at once, requiring only a single payment.

mainFeatures.title: No Limitations
mainFeatures.description: Use as many as you want, from Dribbble presentations to PowerPoint presentations.

designShowcase.mainDescription: Unleash boundless creativity with a large repository of images optimized for designers.

features.title: 5k resolution support
features.description: All images boast a minimum resolution of 5k, ensuring crisp, crystal-clear quality.

features.title: From water to glass
features.description: We offer a wide array of abstractions, ranging from water to glass, and encompassing various styles including 3D and vector.

features.title: Portrait or landscape
features.description: Effortlessly adapt your images for any platform - whether it's a stunning wallpaper or captivating instagram reels and stories.

supportShowcase.mainDescription: In a world where storytelling constantly evolves, don't let licensing and poor support hold you down.

features.title: Faster downloads
features.description: Our robust servers are primed to deliver the highest resolution images swiftly, ensuring a smooth download experience.

features.title: Convenience for teams
features.description: Your single account can accommodate multiple users simultaneously downloading without nay disruptions, streamlining teamwork and productivity.

features.title: Royalty-free licensing
features.description: Our straightforward, royalty-free licensing means our chosen images are yours to innovate without the hassle of negotiating usage rights for every new project.
